short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support extension for Reishibot, helps you get the information needed from the twitch custom rewards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will work after you have loged in champibot.com.

From the configuration page, you will find a link to your channel rewards configuration, there, on that page, you will need to click on the extension icon in order to send your data to reishibot / champibot.
